To create a new project, click on the "Projects" button. Then, click on the "Add project" button. This action opens a prompt where you're asked to fill in specific fields. The only required field is the project name. Fill in the project name field with the desired name "Demo Project". After filling in the project name, click on the "Create project" button.
To delete a project, click on the "Projects" button. From a view containing multiple projects, you can right click on any project and select Delete from the bottom of the menu.

To view a project, click on it to access the project overview. Here, you'll find a brief project summary, project properties, any associated documents and links, a detailed project description, and a list of project milestones.
